title: The Angry Video Game Nerd
fullTitle: The Angry Video Game Nerd (TV Series 2004â€“ )

episodes.title: Raid 2020
episodes.plot: A review 12 years in the making: the AVGN looks at Color Dreams' shameful attempt at an action game.

episodes.title: Mortal Kombat 1 Ports
episodes.plot: The AVGN reviews various console ports of one of the bloodiest fighting games of all time.

episodes.title: Mortal Kombat Rip-Offs
episodes.plot: After reviewing the various home ports of the original Mortal Kombat, the Nerd looks at all the knock-off games that tried to capitalize on MK's success.

episodes.title: Dennis the Menace (SNES)
episodes.plot: The Nerd reviews a real menace of a game, as the 1993 Dennis the Menace movie was made into a terrible Super Nintendo game.

episodes.title: The Incredible Crash Dummies (NES)
episodes.plot: Don't you be a dummy. Avoid playing crazy games like this - and buckle your seat belt.

episodes.title: Bad Final Fight Games
episodes.plot: Final Fight may have been a hit in the arcades, but it's next-gen home console sequels were anything but. The Nerd looks at two Final Fight sequels that were outdated the moment they came out.

episodes.title: Mission: Impossible (N64)
episodes.plot: Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to watch the Nerd overcome the 1998 Mission: Impossible tie-in video game.

episodes.title: Ecco the Dolphin (Sega Genesis)
episodes.plot: The Nerd dives deep into the oceans of hell to review that Genesis classic, Ecco the Dolphin. That one game everybody had, yet nobody understood.

episodes.title: Countdown Vampires (PS1)
episodes.plot: The Nerd's haunting Halloween includes a review of the notorious Resident Evil rip-off, Countdown Vampires. It's got countdowns and vampires, but little else.

episodes.title: The Legend of Kage (NES)
episodes.plot: The Nerd looks at the little-known Nintendo port of one of the poorest arcade ninja games ever made.

episodes.title: Taito Legends (PS2)
episodes.plot: The Legend of Kage was only the beginning. The Nerd reviews a PlayStation 2 port of classic Taito arcade games, ranging in nearly every genre.

episodes.title: The Simpsons: Bartman Meets Radioactive Man
episodes.plot: This Christmas, the Nerd reviews what is considered to be the worst Simpsons game on the NES.
